title: Display employee names instead of codes in approval views

requirements.text: In the holiday approvals view (HolidayApprovals component), display the employee's full name instead of their employee code for each holiday request

quotes: in approvazione ferie e approvazioni permessi voglio vedere i nomi dei dipendenti e non i codici

acceptanceCriteria: The holiday approvals table shows employee names in a dedicated column
Employee codes are no longer displayed as the primary identifier
The employee name is retrieved from the user profile using the userId associated with each request

requirements.text: In the permission approvals view (PermissionApprovals component), display the employee's full name instead of their employee code for each permission request

quotes: in approvazione ferie e approvazioni permessi voglio vedere i nomi dei dipendenti e non i codici

acceptanceCriteria: The permission approvals table shows employee names in a dedicated column
Employee codes are no longer displayed as the primary identifier
The employee name is retrieved from the user profile using the userId associated with each request

requirements.text: Fetch user profiles for all employees who have submitted requests visible in the approval views to enable name lookup
acceptanceCriteria: User profiles are fetched efficiently using the existing useMultipleProfiles hook
Names are displayed even when viewing large lists of requests
Loading states are handled gracefully while profile data is being fetched

constraints: Maintain all existing data and functionality
Do not modify the backend data structures or API
Preserve existing filtering and approval actions in both components
nonGoals: Adding employee codes as a secondary display element
Modifying other views beyond holiday and permission approvals
Changing the approval workflow or business logic
